formatted_address: 21 Bukit Batok Cres, #03-84 Wcega Tower, Singapore 658065
name: Epont Kossan Chemicals

reviews.text: I highly recommend Epont Kossan Chemicals Pte Ltd for anyone looking for epoxy flooring in Singapore. The team was professional and efficient, and the results were stunning! No other company even comes close to their quality and attention to detail. If you're looking for epoxy flooring in Singapore, don't look anywhere else but Epont Kossan Chemicals Pte Ltd.
